title: Last Rays of Daylight
description: Still mourning the death of a close friend, Paul Dodge heads to the sun-soaked beaches of the US Virgin Island of St. Thomas. His vacation is short-lived when a late-season hurricane hits the island and leaves residents to pick up the pieces of their shattered lives. When recovery efforts unveil the body of a young girl hidden in a shipping crate, the Special Agent in Charge puts out a call for help.As identities are discovered and another agent goes missing, it's up to Dodge to find the connection between the murdered girl and the missing agent. Dodge will need all his training and past military experience to survive and find justice for the victim.
author: Christopher Flory
